page.title: 09LIVING IN "TIN TOWN"
page.content: CONT FROM PAGE 8 WE USED TO LIVE IN THE CITY OF CAMBRIDGE, BUT A YEAR AGO, WE MOVED TO CALDECOTE.WE BOUGHT SOME LAND WITH AN OLD REINFORCED CONCRETE BUNGALOW DISGUSTINGLY FILTHY.WE HAVE BEEN LIVING THERE TEMPORARILY.THERE WERE TWO BEADROOMS,A KITCHEN WITH A SHOWER,A LIVING ROOM,A FRONT LOBBY,A BACK LOBBY AND SEVERAL SHEDS IN THE BACK GARDEN.FIRST ME AND JOANNE SLEPT IN ONE ROOM AND DAD AND MUM SLEPT IN THE OTHER ROOM.THEN DAD AND MUM OVED INTO THE LIVING ROOM AND I MOVED INTO THERE BEDROOM.THEN JOANNE MOVED INTO THE LIVING ROOM.DAD AND MUM MOVED INTO THERE ORIGINAL BEDROOM AND I WENT INTO MY ORIGINAL BEDROOM.THEN WE STARTED TO BUILD A NEW BUNGALOW.WE BUILT THE LOUNGE AND THE BATHROOM FIRST.AS SOON AS THE BATHROOM WAS BUILT THE OLD SHOWER {CON'T PAGE 10
